code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ModalAddMonth=_ref=>{let{isOpen,onClose,onAddMonth}=_ref;const[newMonth,setNewMonth]=useState("");const handleAdd=()=>{if(newMonth){onAddMonth(newMonth);setNewMonth("");onClose();}};if(!isOpen)return null;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"fixed inset-0 z-50 flex items-center justify-center bg-black bg-opacity-40",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-white p-6 rounded-lg shadow-lg w-80",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-lg font-semibold mb-4",children:"Tambah Bulan Baru"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"month",value:newMonth,onChange:e=>setNewMonth(e.target.value),className:"w-full border px-2 py-1 mb-4 rounded"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex justify-end space-x-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"bg-gray-300 px-3 py-1 rounded",onClick:onClose,children:"Batal"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"bg-blue-500 text-white px-3 py-1 rounded",onClick:handleAdd,children:"Tambahkan"})]})]})});};export default ModalAddMonth;
